name: There is a Bomb!
description: "There is a bomb" is a game made for the game dev tv game jam, which is a 10 day game jam with the theme of "Death is only the beginning!" The game starts with the player spawning into a room with no idea what is going on. After a little while, something happens... (hint: read the title of the game). Because death is just the beginning, the player respawns in the same place as he or she started the game, and will spend the rest of the short, fun, mysterious, and sometimes challenging game trying to 1) locate it 2) figuring out how to disarm it and 3) actually disarming it.
